history.content: Interested in data science and social good? There's a 2 unit DeCal for you! I am co-teaching a DeCal this semester that explores ethical implications of data science. We also explore ways of using data science to promote social good. There will be short programming assignments, as well as a final project where you can apply what you learned. Our first class is September 4 in 205 Dwinelle at 630pm! Come to learn more about the class & get a permission code to enroll. Prerequisites are some exposure to python, pandas, and basic ML concepts (e.g. Data 8 + CS61A/CS88 or DS 100). Email emansishah@berkeley.edu or samson.mataraso@berkeley.edu with any questions.
history.subject: DeCal: Exploring Data Science and Social Good
